remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
addd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
add4d.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
add42d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) + ( C + D ) ) = ( ( A + C ) + ( D + B ) ) ) $.
